convert.path: The path to a image file or the directory with the image files to be processed.
convert.save_as: The format to save the images as.
convert.--save_folder: The directory where the images will be saved.
convert.--mode: The color mode to use when saving the image.
convert.--background: The color to use when saving a image with a mode that has alpha channel to a image mode that does NOT have alpha channel. The transparent area on the original image will be filled with the given color.
convert.-optimize: If passed, the resulting images will be optimized for a smaller file size. Only works for jpg and png images.
